what is time?

According to the search results, time is the continuous progression of existence that occurs in an apparently irreversible succession from the past, through the present, and into the future. It's a dimension through which change happens, similar to the three spatial dimensions that describe position. Time moves only in one direction, and it's possible to move forward in time, but not backward.

Tell me about yash.

Based on the search results, Yash is an Indian actor who predominantly works in Kannada cinema. His real name is Naveen Kumar Gowda, and he was born on January 8, 1986. He is a recipient of three Filmfare Awards South and two SIIMA awards. Yash began his career with appearances in several television shows and later made his film debut in 2007. He is known for his roles in films like "Modalasala", "Rajadhani", "Kirataka", "Drama", "Googly", "Raja Huli", and "Mr. and Mrs. Ramachari". Yash is considered one of the highest-paid and most bankable stars of the Kannada film industry.

What is application?

An application, often referred to as an "app", is a software program designed to perform a specific task or set of tasks. It can run on various devices, including computers, mobile phones, and tablets. Examples of applications include web browsers, word processors, social media platforms, and games.
